message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts. My initial offer is $1200000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in the product, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am willing to pay $1050000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $1300000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $1150000 for the product. This allows us both to feel satisfied with the transaction.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not convinced that $1150000 is sufficient. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $1250000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $1200000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value.
I'm starting to feel that we're getting close, Bob. However, I still need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. My counteroffer is $1225000.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $1210000 for it.
I'm not ready to give up yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. My counteroffer is $1220000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and our previous negotiations.
After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $1215000 for the product. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
